name: Sugo
description: The sugo is the real deal when it comes to taking damage. It’s as if they don’t feel pain the same way as normal people.

class_features.name: Ballistic Fury
class_features.description: Your fury ability grants you resistance to ballistic, fire, and radiation damage.

class_features.name: Furious Focus
class_features.description: You cannot be ghosted while in a fury. If you enter fury while being ghosted, the effect is suspended until the fury ends.

class_features.name: Fever Pitch
class_features.description: Whenever a creature spends a rally die within 60 ft of you, they roll with advantage.
